argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | oppggic.o | |- O = ( oppG ` G ) |
| 2 |  | #P_subgrcl | |- ( x e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> G e. Grp ) |
| 3 |  | #P_subgrcl | |- ( x e. ( SubGrp ` O ) -> O e. Grp ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_oppggrpb | |- ( G e. Grp <-> O e. Grp ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_sylibr | |- ( x e. ( SubGrp ` O ) -> G e. Grp ) |
| 6 | 1 | #P_oppgsubm | |- ( SubMnd ` G ) = ( SubMnd ` O ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_eleq2i | |- ( x e. ( SubMnd ` G ) <-> x e. ( SubMnd ` O ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_a1i | |- ( G e. Grp -> ( x e. ( SubMnd ` G ) <-> x e. ( SubMnd ` O ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( invg ` G ) = ( invg ` G ) |
| 10 | 1, 9 | #P_oppginv | |- ( G e. Grp -> ( invg ` G ) = ( invg ` O ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_fveq1d | |- ( G e. Grp -> ( ( invg ` G ) ` y ) = ( ( invg ` O ) ` y ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( G e. Grp -> ( ( ( invg ` G ) ` y ) e. x <-> ( ( invg ` O ) ` y ) e. x ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_ralbidv | |- ( G e. Grp -> ( A. y e. x ( ( invg ` G ) ` y ) e. x <-> A. y e. x ( ( invg ` O ) ` y ) e. x ) ) |
| 14 | 8, 13 | #P_anbi12d | |- ( G e. Grp -> ( ( x e. ( SubMnd ` G ) /\ A. y e. x ( ( invg ` G ) ` y ) e. x ) <-> ( x e. ( SubMnd ` O ) /\ A. y e. x ( ( invg ` O ) ` y ) e. x ) ) ) |
| 15 | 9 | #P_issubg3 | |- ( G e. Grp -> ( x e. ( SubGrp ` G ) <-> ( x e. ( SubMnd ` G ) /\ A. y e. x ( ( invg ` G ) ` y ) e. x ) ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( invg ` O ) = ( invg ` O ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_issubg3 | |- ( O e. Grp -> ( x e. ( SubGrp ` O ) <-> ( x e. ( SubMnd ` O ) /\ A. y e. x ( ( invg ` O ) ` y ) e. x ) ) ) |
| 18 | 4, 17 | #P_sylbi | |- ( G e. Grp -> ( x e. ( SubGrp ` O ) <-> ( x e. ( SubMnd ` O ) /\ A. y e. x ( ( invg ` O ) ` y ) e. x ) ) ) |
| 19 | 14, 15, 18 | #P_3bitr4d | |- ( G e. Grp -> ( x e. ( SubGrp ` G ) <-> x e. ( SubGrp ` O ) ) ) |
| 20 | 2, 5, 19 | #P_pm5.21nii | |- ( x e. ( SubGrp ` G ) <-> x e. ( SubGrp ` O ) ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_eqriv | |- ( SubGrp ` G ) = ( SubGrp ` O ) |
